heroSlider.heading: ICE Enterprises Presents
heroSlider.description: Ice Enterprises offers a safe, secure, and frictionless platform that allows OWNERS of ICE Poker Wearables to rent their NFTs to PLAYERS at rates they set on a short-, medium- or long-term basis.

cards.title: Owner Action
cards.description: Connect your preferred wallet and list an available wearable for rent. OWNERS are free to set the rental fee (min. 50 ICE per day) and have a variety of rental terms to choose from. A 4% service fee is assessed and deducted automatically from the daily rental fees you will receive.

cards.title: Player Action
cards.description: Scroll through the list of available items and click on the wearable you’d like to rent. Simply connect your wallet to submit payment. A 2% rental fee is added to the total rental cost.

cards.title: Secure Escrow Account
cards.description: Funds from PLAYERS are held in an escrow account - secured by smart contract - that provides automated prorated payments to OWNERS on a daily basis.

cards.title: Notification & Delegation
cards.description: OWNERS are notified of rental requests, and have 3 hours to release the rental upon server reset to PLAYERS. If a rental is not assigned within the allotted time frame, all funds are automatically and immediately returned to that PLAYER (including the service fee).

cards.title: Owner
cards.summary: I'm looking to rent my wearable.
list: Generate more ICE per day/wearable while obtaining more consistent returns.
Convenience! With automated payments, there is no need to check-in with a renting PLAYER each day.
Added ICE utility across the ecosystem.

cards.title: Player
cards.summary: I'm looking to rent a wearable.
list: Safe and secure approach! If a wearable is ever undelegated, remaining funds are sent back to your wallet.
Certainty that OWNER actually has an available wearable for delegation.
Browse a library of available options instead of spamming discord against competition.

list.title: Do my wearables ever leave my wallet?
list.description: No. We serve strictly as an intermediary between OWNERS and PLAYERS looking to broker a rental relationship. Your wearables never leave your wallet.

sidehustle.title: Side-Hustle + Fun Fact
sidehustle.value: ICE Poker Guild Manager + Aspiring Golfer

paragraph.blueText: Our team minted two genesis ICE Suit wearables in October 2021
paragraph.blackTextR: and we continue adding to our portfolio whenever possible. We have been amazed to see the phenomenal growth and development of ICE Poker in such a short time. We have also followed with great interest how the growing user base coupled with pent up demand has led to the development of an ad hoc rental market.

paragraph.blueText: complaints of fraud and abuse are rampant on Discord
paragraph.blackTextL: This rental market, however, has not yet been optimized. There is no easy way to effectuate these transactions, and
paragraph.blackTextR: Players have no certainty that parties representing themselves as Owners really have the wearables. What happens if an OWNER forgets to delegate or (undelegates) after confirming a rental? they are offering; have no recourse should they send a rental fee in advance to a bad actor; and not surprisingly are hesitant to commit funds on more than a day-to-day basis.

paragraph.blueText: While Owners would welcome the extra revenue a rental would provide, there is no convenient way to list wearables and find Players.
paragraph.blackTextL: The current system is not ideal for Owners either.
paragraph.blackTextR: And even if a medium- or longer-term rental is agreed upon, because Players are rightfully reluctant to forward a long-term rental fee, Owners need to keep track of on a daily basis to ensure payments have been made.

paragraph.blueText: we knew that Players must have confidence to rent knowing that the wearable is as advertised;
paragraph.blackTextL: As our portfolio of wearables grew, we faced these problems every day. That is why we set out to design a system that eased our own administrative burden. But for it to work,
paragraph.blackTextR: their rental fee would be secure; and they’d have recourse to get the fee back if they were undelaged or something went awry.

paragraph.blueText: we quickly realized that our solution would benefit everyone in the community.
paragraph.blackTextR: And thus, the Ice Enterprises’ Rent-2-Play platform was born. We hope that you enjoy this service and look forward to growing alongside Decentral Games, ICE Poker, and the amazing team and community behind this disruptive P2E opportunity.

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: This is the Privacy & Cookies Policy (the ‘Policy’) of Ice Enterprises, LLC (hereafter “Ice Enterprises”’, “we” or “us”). Your privacy is important to us, and this Policy describes the ways in which we collect and use information about you when you use our website. This policy is effective as of February 1, 2022 and was last updated on February 1, 2022.

infoWeCollect.heading: Information We Collect
paragraphs: We do NOT require registration to use this site or our Service

We do NOT collect information about Players/Renters in the course of accessing our Service. We request email addresses from Owners/Delegators solely for the purpose of sending notifications regarding the use of the service (e.g., reminders to delegate; notice of rental term expiration, etc.), and we may obtain email addresses in the course of responding to inquiries. We do not sell or share such information with any third parties.
We do NOT utilize cookies or any other tracking mechanisms on this site.

linkToWebsites.heading: Links To Other Websites
paragraphs: Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party’s site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

changesToPrivacyPolicy.heading: Changes To This Privacy Policy
changesToPrivacyPolicy.paragraph: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contactUs.heading: Contact Us
contactUs.paragraph: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us

termsOfService.heading: Terms Of Service
termsOfService.iceDescription: The Ice Enterprises Subscription Platform is designed to offer a safe, secure, and frictionless platform allowing OWNERS of ICE Poker Wearables to rent their NFTs to PLAYERS at rates they set on a short, medium or long term basis. It was created by Ice Poker wearable owners who want to see this community thrive. We are P2E enthusiasts just like you. Hop on the Discord, contact one of our team members, and we will work to address any questions or concerns you might have.

whatWeOwn.heading: What We Own
whatWeOwn.description: This platform is owned and operated by Ice Enterprises, LLC (“the Company”). All rights that are not specifically granted to the users are reserved by the Company. This includes but is not limited to the intellectual property rights surrounding the Platform and “Ice Enterprises” name, logos, trademarks, the website, the look and feel of the user interface, and the smart contract code.

limitationOfLiability.heading: Limitations Of Liability for Gas, Failed Transactions, Smart Contract Bugs
limitationOfLiability.description: We have worked very hard to make sure that there are no bugs in our smart contract and that our initial launch is smooth. As we have seen in many previous projects, however, sometimes things break. You agree to hold the Company harmless for any losses you may incur as a consequence of an OWNER not renting a wearable or wearables, or a PLAYER not being able to rent a wearable.

noGaurantees.heading: No Guarantees Or Future Promises
noGaurantees.description: The Company hopes to continue to develop this platform by providing additional utility and ease of use in response to community feedback on an ongoing basis. While we intend to work towards those goals, we cannot guarantee future developments. You agree that signing up for a specific rental period, and the benefits and obligations associated thereto, is all you are guaranteed. You agree that you are not relying on any future commitments in using this platform and your participation resets at the conclusion of each individual rental period.

taxes.heading: Taxes
taxes.description: OWNERS are entirely responsible for any tax liability which may arise from renting wearables, and OWNERS and PLAYERS are entirely responsible for any tax liability which may arise from earning ICE in daily competitions or related ICE Poker events when renting wearables through this platform.

classAction.heading: Class Action Waiver
classAction.description: You agree to waive any class action status, and any legal dispute around the Service which you may choose to bring can only be done on an individual basis.

children.heading: Children
children.description: Our Service is not targeted towards children. You agree that you are over the age of 18, or above the legal age of your jurisdiction, whichever is greater.

arbitration.heading: Arbitration
arbitration.description: Any controversy or claim arising out of or relating to using the ICE Enterprises platform shall be settled by arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association in accordance with its Commercial Arbitration Rules, and judgment on the award rendered by the arbitrator(s) may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof.

jurisdiction.heading: Jurisdiction & Choice Of Law
jurisdiction.description: You agree that for purposes of any legal dispute, you will be subject to the jurisdiction of Deleward and that any legal proceeding will be brought in Delaware.

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: You understand that the Ethereum and Polygon blockchain networks are public blockchains, and all of your transaction history initiated through this website will be made public. Please refer to our full privacy policy on our website.

playerRenter.description: In order to participate as a Player/Renter on the Ice Enterprises Subscription Platform, an individual must follow these steps
procedures: Select a Wearable you would like to rent.
Deposit the full rental amount amount (in ICE) plus service fee into the Ice Enterprises Subscription Platform Escrow Account.

ownerDelegator.description: In order to participate as an Owner/Delegator on the Ice Enterprises Subscription Platform, an individual must follow these steps
procedures: Own one or more ICE Poker Wearable NFT.
List the Ice Poker Wearable(s) you are making available to rent.
Select rental rate and term for each wearable.
Respond to any rental requests within 3-hours of being notified by Ice Enterprises of a rental request.
Delegate the rented wearable(s) on or before 12:00 UTC for the term of the rental.

fees.heading: Fees For Using The Platform
fees.description: A 4% service fee is assessed and deducted automatically from the rental due the Owner; a 2% service fee is added to the PLAYER’s total rental cost.

footer.copyright: Ice Enterprises, LLC. All rights reserved.
